abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Social Welfare
            Development Project for Croatia is to strengthen the quality
            of social services and improve administration, planning and
            policy making of the social welfare system. The extension is
            necessary to provide sufficient time to deliver and install
            the information technology (IT) equipment (US$2.1 million)
            and install LAN (local area network) cabling network (US$0.4
            million) in the social welfare institutions throughout
            Croatia. Without the extension, the Government will not be
            able to use loan funds for completing the two remaining
            activities necessary for the completion of the social
            welfare management information system (MIS). Without Bank
            financing, completion of the mentioned activities will
            depend on ministry of health and social welfare's
            ability to allocate $2.5 million of own funds for this
            purpose, which might be difficult given the reduced
            investment budget of the ministry and could jeopardize the
            completion of the MIS.
